resources.string:
Welcome to use Garage interface

Instruction:

1) Click the toolbar house garage icon to reach control page.

2) In the control page, Swipe the garage door or light switch button will control the garage door open/close and light turn on/off. Also, when opening the garage door will turn on the light automatically.

3) Swipe the spinner to control brightness of garage light.

Welcome to use House Temperature interface

Instruction:

1) Click the toolbar house temperature icon to reach control page.

2) In control page, click top toolbar of temperature icon will reach temperature setting dialog, scroll the numbers to set current house temperature.

3) Click top toolbar of schedule icon will reach the schedule setting page, click each button of the set date, set time,and set temperature to set the schedule of the house temperature and click confirm button, the schedule of temperature setting will list in the main page. Click one of the list item will display a dialog that ask to delete this schedule time. Click switch button will allow to turn on/off the this schedule.

4) Click the top toolbar camera icon will reach the device camera.

5) Click the top toolbar person icon will display the button snackbar information.

Welcome to use Weather interface

Instruction:

1) Click the toolbar house temperature icon to reach control page;

2) In control page, it will display the current outside temperature, humidity and wind speed.
